chapter.title: Fixes, Limitations, & Known Issues
chapter.para: ${projectName} issues are tracked at . This chapter covers the status of key issues and limitations at release ${docTargetVersion}.

section.title: Fixes
section.para: The following issues were fixed in release ${docTargetVersion}.

listitem.para: OPENIG-7: Configuration option to set the user's sessionIndex from the IDP in the ${projectName} session
OPENIG-6: Missing relativePath in saas/pbworks module

section.title: Limitations
section.para: ${projectName} Federation does not run on Glassfish V3 due to conflicts with the Metro libraries.
